name: @essentials/one-key-map
author: Jared Lunde <jared@BeStellar.co> (https://jaredLunde.com)
description: A Map-like data structure that only stores the most recently set key/value pair

scripts.build: npm run build-main && npm run build-es && npm run build-types
scripts.build-main: babel src -d dist/main -x .ts --ignore "**/*.test.ts","**/test.ts" --delete-dir-on-start && sed -i '' -e 's/this\.set = void 0/ /g' dist/main/index.js && sed -i '' -e 's/this\.get = void 0/ /g' dist/main/index.js
scripts.build-es: babel src -d dist/module -x .ts --env-name=module --ignore "**/*.test.ts","**/test.ts" --delete-dir-on-start  && sed -i '' -e 's/this\.set = void 0/ /g' dist/module/index.js && sed -i '' -e 's/this\.get = void 0/ /g' dist/module/index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run format
scripts.validate: npm run check-types && npm run lint && npm run test -- --coverage
